noisyninja.com.marvelcharacterlibrary

Class NoisyApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • noisyninja.com.marvelcharacterlibrary.NoisyApplication

  • public class NoisyApplication
extends Application
    Custom applicaation to maintain app specific volley network request queue and Image loader(unused), using Glide to load and chache images Created by ir2pid on 13/03/16.
